哄.definition: to deceive; to coax; to amuse (a child)

哄動.definition: variant of 轟動|轰动[hong1 dong4]

哄動一時.definition: variant of 轟動一時|轰动一时[hong1 dong4 yi1 shi2]

哄堂大笑.definition: the whole room roaring with laughter (idiom)

哄抬.definition: to artificially inflate; to bid up (the price)

哄笑.definition: to roar with laughter; hoots of laughter; guffaw
